channel.title: Gitbook on LuyangのBlog
channel.description: Recent content in Gitbook on LuyangのBlog

item.title: gitbook
item.description: nvm node npm curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/creationix/nvm/v0.33.6/install.sh | bash source ~/.zshrc nvm install node npm config set registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org gitbook npm install gitbook-cli -g gitbook 常见命令 List installed versions: gitbook ls List available versions on NPM: gitbook ls-remote Install a specific version: gitbook fetch 2.1.0 # or a pre-release gitbook fetch beta Update to the latest version gitbook update Uninstall a specific version gitbook uninstall 2.0.1 使用
